content: {"name": "FOREST HILL UMC SECOND BLESSINGS", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Forest Hill serves the students and families of Irvin Elementary, Royal Oaks Elementary, Beverly Hills, and Boger Elementary Schools.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.foresthillumc.org/positive-provisions/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "265 Union Street North", "address_2": null, "city": "Concord", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28025", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4170517, "longitude": -80.5897119}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 782-1109", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
